channel.title: Changing the fonts (Size of text)

item.title: Changing the fonts (Size of text)
item.dc:creator: @Lordabyssal Lordabyssal
item.description:
@Lordabyssal wrote:

I would like to change the size of my text to a larger amount would anyone have an idea how to do this??

public static void SkillMasteryWindow(TextDrawingArea[] tda){ RSInterface Interface = addTabInterface(34400); addSprite(34401, 0, "Interfaces/LevelUpInterface/levelup"); addText(34402, "120", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, tda, 1); //addSprite(34402, 1, "Interfaces/LevelUpInterface/NewSkillMastery"); setChildren(2,Interface); setBounds(34401, 185, 0, 0, Interface); setBounds(34402, 250, 50, 1, Interface); //setBounds(34402, 140, 100, 1, Interface); }

Interface code.
